attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to Remove homework from all schools across the uk, children do enough work in school and are well educated in school, at home children should be able to relax and have free time, thats why children come home and dont stay at school longer and most of the childrens home work never gets marked anyway. Some children also stay of school if they have forgot about homework and don't want to get in trouble so this affecting more education than the piece of homewrok would do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
